text: Algirdas Mykolas Brazauskas (22 September 1932 - 26 June 2010) was the first President of Lithuania from 1993 to 1998 and Prime Minister from 2001 to 2006. Brazauskas died from lymphatic cancer in Vilnius, Lithuania, aged 77. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1932 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Lithuania Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:Presidents of Lithuania Category:Prime ministers of Lithuania Category:Speakers of the Seimas
title: Algirdas Brazauskas
